title: Everyone is taking TP because you nerfed heal for no reason, not because it's op
body: Maybe instead of nerfing TP (which btw im pretty sure TP needs a buff, if anything), you could nerf the retardedly op ignite (an op spell that also happens to counter heal) and people would start taking heal again, and TP would be less popular. Thanks.

Ugh, yeah. It's complicated, but I feel like if we have to have 1 OP Summoner Spell (aside from Flash), it's probably best if it's TP.

If Ignite is the best, then everyone is just looking to get kills and snowball. If Heal/Ghost/Barrier are meta, then people just farm forever while avoiding every gank with their Summs.

But if TP is strong, that just means that people have to spend less time walking back to lane, and they get to make cross-map plays. Those seem like fun things to me... right?
TP is used to snowball games out of control as well.
Yeah I guess. But you can at least use it defensively to slow down a snowball as well. Ignite can only be used offensively (and in a rather boring way, imo).
